annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I am making a cocktail presented by Luxardo called the Negroni Bianco. This is a less overpowering bitter than the standard ...
annotations.title: Negroni Bianco | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5oz Junipero Gin
1.5oz Luxardo bitter bianco
.75oz Alessio Vermouth bianco

Stir and pour
Garnish with orange twist and maraschino cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JagID_iAcIg
title: Negroni Bianco
